Title: Ishqiya
Writer: Vishal Bhardwaj (screenplay), Sabrina Dhawan (screenplay), Abhishek Chaubey (screenplay), Vishal Bhardwaj (dialogues)
Actors: Vidya Balan, Naseeruddin Shah, Arshad Warsi, Salman Shahid
Plot: While on the run from goons, a man and his nephew fall for a kidnapper's seductive widow.
